episodes.title: What are cults and why do people join them? – BBC REEL
episodes.description:
Most cults don't claim to be cults. In fact, many of the people involved may not even realise they are in one.

Journalist Tui McLean explores these mysterious groups through a psychological lens, examining what a cult actually is, and how some cults have been able to make ordinary people do unthinkable things.


Video by Tui McLean
Animation by Michal Bialozej

#bbcreel #bbc #bbcnews
